content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Dear Isabelle users,

the forthcoming Isabelle2023 is anticipated for the second half of Aug-2023,
shortly after the ITP conference in Bia≈Çystok.

For further details, see the dynamically updated blog entry
https://isabelle-dev.sketis.net/phame/post/view/68/release_candidates_for_isabelle2023

Presently there is a very early preview for experimentation:
https://isabelle.sketis.net/website-Isabelle2023-RC0

The NEWS file is mostly in proper shape, but a few things still missing; some
documentation not yet written; some other important things not fully
implemented yet.

Proper Isabelle2023-RC1 is to be expected in approx. 5 weeks: then the release
process really starts.

When discussing observations about Isabelle2023-RC0, it makes more sense to
produce a specific Subject line for a new mail thread, instead of re-using
this announcement without thinking.

Makarius
